```{r}
oakland_boundary <- 
  places("CA", cb = T, progress_bar = FALSE) %>% 
  filter(NAME == "Oakland")
  
mapview(oakland_boundary, alpha.regions = 0.1)

oakland_blocks <- 
  blocks("CA", county = 001, year = 2020) 

pal = mapviewPalette("mapviewTopoColors")


mapview(oakland_blocks, alpha.regions = .2, col.regions = "blue") + mapview(oakland_boundary, alpha.regions = 0, col.regions = "red")

oakland_blocks <- 
  blocks("CA", county = 001, year = 2010)

mapview(oakland_blocks, alpha.regions = 0.1) + mapview(oakland_boundary, alpha.regions = 0)
  
```
